text: Reminder: Update Harvest.
<@U2H61EJSG> <@U1ZG1UCAK> do you want to try our test account <mailto:jenkins@uncorkedstudios.com|jenkins@uncorkedstudios.com> (pass: w4t3r4v3) - or do you need something new + fresh?
also i dont have an uncorked cc yet, but we can borrow one :slightly_smiling_face:
if needed / there isnt already one associated with that
let's try jenkins
<@U13GPDA1F> Jenkins doesn’t have a linked billing account. Can you help us secure a CC?
yep - do we expect any charges? if so, could you shoot me a screenshot or any info?
free trial is 60 days :slightly_smiling_face:
cool - can you shoot me a way to access this stuff (ill update with my CC info when i receive it)
midori: whats the fee post 60 days?
in case we need it
It kind of depends on our usage. They have a calculator, but I don't know enough information yet to have a definitive answer.
oh okay - i set a reminder, so shoot me a link to where i can access account info when you have a chance and i’ll make sure to check in before the trial is up

<https://cloud.google.com/free-trial/docs/>
It looks like once the trial is up, you have to elect to upgrade in order to be charged, so there shouldn't be any risk of accidentally using after the trial is up.
We should be able to get a sense of how much we would use, by running training on the trial account. Is it okay to update next week once we get things running?
Sending the link via email so it doesn't get buried in slack
oh perfect
yes thank you!

<@U0260V1BX> FYI adam resolved his original request (thank you!) but is asking to update how we show “add a new case” - currently in overflow, but requesting stand alone page for “My Cases” that would include their info + info about other cases + CTA for pairing new case
this is in the deck, but wanted to call out and see if you thought you could tackle that new screen  (he was hoping to receive Monday, but let me know was realistic)
<!here|@here> im going to be WFH this afternoon, if you need me :slightly_smiling_face: :fingerscrossed:
<@U026PHQ3J> im jumping into that thread but wanted to ask a q first
for quick tile setting - users need to manually add that right?
and we cant have it automatically be added to their menu upon install
im pretty concerned thats going to be a big lift for unsophisticated users, so i just wanted to gently raise that

<@U0260V1BX> in case evans didnt already tell you - adam started a thread re: accommodating users who may have legacy cases + new cases, specifically around the shortcut and how we’ll trigger without the button (will loop you in when i respond)
<@U13GPDA1F> should i prioritize adam’s above request ahead of the trends flows?
yeah - we have until wed for trends so i think that makes sense (assuming you think you had bandwidth to do both within that timeframe)
not sure how much time you think you need for both though - so let me know and happy to re-set expectations if needed
yep
yeah i think i can get them both done
